title: Queen of the border
brief_description: A film on the border town of Hawick, at work and at play. Hawick’s fame rests not only o its ancient battle honours, commemorated for three days every year, but on the sweaters which its craftsmen have knitted for generations, and which the film shows in process of manufacture.
